description: Manages load balancer rule members on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

domain.description: Domain the rule is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the firewall rule is related to.

state.description: Should the VMs be present or absent from the rule.

account.description: Account the rule is related to.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the rule should be located. If not set, default zone is used.

ip_address.description: Public IP address from where the network traffic will be load balanced from. Only needed to find the rule if C(name) is not unique.

vms.description: List of VMs to assign to or remove from the rule.

name.description: The name of the load balancer rule.
